rules_text:
Take an extra turn after this one.
If Enter Eternity would leave your graveyard, exile it instead.
Bloodborn 12–{U} [i]({U}: Exile this from your graveyard with twelve gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]
